entities.name: gryffindors
entities.description: A group of students from Gryffindor house who are gathered around Ron.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is the person who is belching large slugs and nobody wants to touch him.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper whose cabin is nearest to where Ron is being taken.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the person who suggests taking Ron to Hagrid's cabin and tries to hold him still.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is the person who nods bravely and helps Harry pull Ron up by the arms.

entities.name: colin
entities.description: Colin is a student who runs down from his seat to see what's happening with Ron and takes pictures with his camera.

relationships.description: Harry helps pull Ron up by the arms.
Hermione helps Harry pull Ron up by the arms.
Harry gets angry with Colin for trying to take pictures of Ron.
